00033 #include <OpenImageIO/fmath.h>
00034 
00035 #include <OSL/genclosure.h>
00036 
00037 #include "osl_closures.h"
00038 
00039 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00040 
00041 using namespace OSL;
00042 
00043 class TransparentClosure : public BSDFClosure {
00044 public:
00045     TransparentClosure() : BSDFClosure(Labels::STRAIGHT, Back) { }
00046 
00047     void setup() {}
00048 
00049     size_t memsize () const { return sizeof(*this); }
00050 
00051     const char *name () const { return "transparent"; }
00052 
00053     void print_on (std::ostream &out) const {
00054         out << name() << " ()";
00055     }
00056 
00057     float albedo (const Vec3 &omega_out) const
00058     {
00059         return 1.0f;
00060     }
00061 
00062     Color3 eval_reflect (const Vec3 &omega_out, const Vec3 &omega_in, float& pdf) const
00063     {
00064         return Color3 (0, 0, 0);
00065     }
00066 
00067     Color3 eval_transmit (const Vec3 &omega_out, const Vec3 &omega_in, float& pdf) const
00068     {
00069         return Color3 (0, 0, 0);
00070     }
00071 
00072     ustring sample (const Vec3 &Ng,
00073                  const Vec3 &omega_out, const Vec3 &domega_out_dx, const Vec3 &domega_out_dy,
00074                  float randu, float randv,
00075                  Vec3 &omega_in, Vec3 &domega_in_dx, Vec3 &domega_in_dy,
00076                  float &pdf, Color3 &eval) const
00077     {
00078         // only one direction is possible
00079         omega_in = -omega_out;
00080         domega_in_dx = -domega_out_dx;
00081         domega_in_dy = -domega_out_dy;
00082         pdf = 1;
00083         eval.setValue(1, 1, 1);
00084         return Labels::TRANSMIT;
00085     }
00086 };
00087 
00088 
00089 
00090 ClosureParam bsdf_transparent_params[] = {
00091     CLOSURE_STRING_KEYPARAM("label"),
00092     CLOSURE_FINISH_PARAM(TransparentClosure) };
00093 
00094 CLOSURE_PREPARE(bsdf_transparent_prepare, TransparentClosure)
00095 
00096 CCL_NAMESPACE_END
